about_the_game:
ATURD ! The Game




*STORY*
Johnny had to come back and find evidences against his abuser but... She was already there...
Ransack your house to find evidences against... "The Turd" and avoid her at any cost!
Her dog just stepped on a Bee and she is now furious for no reasons.
If she gets to you, she will hit you and make you make you loose your mind.. !


* You play "Jojo" in the Third person view and you need to search evidences in your house by hitting the furniture's.
* You will be able to loot evidences, make sure your Ex-wife doesn't touch them or she will destroy them.
* Only the furniture's that are not "black & white" can be destroyed with Left/Right Mouse Click to make punches.


* Your Ex-wife, aka "ATurd" is there, wanting to start an argument with you. Her rage increases when you hit furniture's and find evidences.
* The more rage she has, the more argument she will have with you. You need to correctly type the text displayed on screen to block her attack.
* If you get hit you'll loose life and die. You will also loose Sanity, causing a confusion effect on your camera.
* Hide in the bathroom to get some peace and sanity back !


* Drink wine to heal, because isn't it happy hour anytime ? But not too much... or you'll fall when you try to sprint !



* Once you found all the evidences, you will have to find some specific objects in your house.
* Lastly escape the map by going to your car !

Will you find all the evidences and leave the house before loosing your mind... or worst... that she kills you?



* Your agent is coming soon to sign your new movie contract ! But your Ex-Wife decided to make a mess
* Run after her and clean the army of turd that come out from her body (how does she do that?!)


* You can make her busy by calling her at some specific location, giving you time to find & clean the turds
* You have one mop for the floor and another tool for the walls (Left click / Right Click)

highlighted.name: "I Did Not Punch You, I Was Hitting You"

content_descriptors.notes:
* Domestic abuse:  The male character in the game is getting hit by his wife, he has to protect himself during the argument by doing a QTE. If the player fails to type the word, he gets punched. If he succeeds he will block the attack.

* Alcoholism - The male character can drink wine to regenerate his health bar. If he drinks too much his vision gets blurry and when he "sprints" he has chance to fall on the floor.
